### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_name VARCHAR(255),
  current_price DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE StockPrices SET current_price = 100 WHERE id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_name VARCHAR(255),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE market_fluctuations (
  market_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  market_name VARCHAR(255),
  fluctuation DECIMAL(10, 2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE stock_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_id INT,
  update_info TEXT,
  update_time TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE stock_prices SET price = 1000.00 WHERE stock_id = 1;
